attribute.name: content
attribute.description: String containing the XML content to be transformed.

attribute.name: contentLocation
attribute.description: String containing the location of the XML content to be transformed.

attribute.name: contentStream
attribute.description: Value binding expression referencing an InputStream from which the XML content is to be read.

attribute.name: stylesheet
attribute.description: String containing the XSL information to use in the transformation.

attribute.name: stylesheetLocation
attribute.description: String containing the location of the XSL stylesheet to use in the transformation.

attribute.name: styleStream
attribute.description: Value binding expression referencing an InputStream from which the XSL stylesheet is to be read.
